item.title: Getting started with prestashop
item.description: Installation or Setup # PrestaShop can be download here. You can find system requirements here. Installation # Quick installation guide: Download and unzip the PrestaShop package to a directory in you web hosting. Create a database for PrestaShop. Open a browser to the url where are PrestaShop files. Follow the screen istructions. Delete the /install directory and rename /admin directory. Official PrestaShop documentation to install: http://doc.prestashop.com/display/PS16/Installing+PrestaShop
